code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{parse}from'node-html-parser';var WebXRApp=function WebXRApp(props){useEffect(function(){var parsedHTML=parse(props.app);var scripts=parsedHTML.childNodes[0].querySelectorAll('script');scripts.forEach(function(s){console.log("loading:",s.rawAttrs);console.log(window.location);var script=document.createElement("script");if(s.attributes&&s.attributes.src){var src="".concat(window.location.pathname,"WebXRApps/").concat(props.appFolder,"/").concat(s.attributes&&s.attributes.src?s.attributes.src:"");script.type="module";if(s.attributes.src.slice(0,4)==="http"){src=s.attributes&&s.attributes.src?s.attributes.src:"";script.type="async";}script.src=src;script.async=false;document.body.appendChild(script);}});});return React.createElement("div",{dangerouslySetInnerHTML:{__html:props.app}});};export default WebXRApp;
